I love that idea! A family picnic with lawn games is a perfect way to bring everyone together, create new memories, and celebrate your great aunt's legacy. It's a beautiful way to honor her memory and continue her tradition of bringing people together.

A picnic setting can be very relaxed and casual, which can help to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for your family reunion. You can also consider having a potluck where everyone brings a dish to share, which can add to the sense of community and togetherness.

It's great that you're thinking about how to make this reunion a celebration of your great aunt's life and legacy. By incorporating activities and elements that were important to her, you can make the event feel more meaningful and special.

Remember to also take some time to share stories and memories of your great aunt during the reunion. You could have a designated time for people to share their favorite memories or stories about her, or you could create a memory book or scrapbook for people to contribute to. This can be a wonderful way to keep her memory alive and celebrate her impact on your family.

How do you think you'll go about planning the picnic and lawn games? Will you have a specific theme or schedule of activities, or do you want to keep things more relaxed and informal?
